entry.title: [VIDEO] One Person Depapepe on the Street of Sannomiya
entry.content: Was walking to the station when I was stopped by this guy’s guitar performance. His name is Matsubara Kei (松原　恵). He wasn’t selling any CDs. Maybe it’s just his hobby to play on the street.

entry.title: [SHARE] Speaking of Kaomoji
entry.content: Did you know that you can insert kaomoji (顔文字) like this (*≧▽≦) or this （＾▽＾）／＼（＾▽＾） easily and fast using Kaomoji for Mac?

entry.title: [SHARE] Interesting Findings #2
entry.content:
• Why do I feel that this dispute between Japan and China is a one-sided conflict? And what even baffled me is that it is all because of those tiny islands. And they said that religious people are out of their minds.

  • Can’t wait to get my hand on one of this messes.

  • Fascinating camera concept.

  • How to awaken one’s artistic side to create magical world like this?

  • Today’s xkcd comic is mystifying. I thought it’s one big image.

  • Piano Level: Asian Kid. You want to learn piano? No, you don’t.

entry.title: [NEWS] Going Forward
entry.content:
I’ve been using many blogging services. Started with Wordpress, Blogger, Tumblr and most recent one was Posterous. I was satisfied with Posterous, until Twitter acquired them. For some reason, the posts I sent via email got published hours after I sent them. Asked them via Twitter about this but no response. So I figured it is time to move on.

Going forward, I’m going to use Octopress+Github Pages for blogging. Not really easy to setup, but seems cool. And this is the first post. I thought simply posting “Hello world” or “This is my first post” will be so boring. So I share with you a video from David Mitchell. I mean, just for his voice this video has to be shared.

Until next time.
